Package com.emse.spring.faircorp.api

Class HeaterController

java.lang.Object
com.emse.spring.faircorp.api.HeaterController
@CrossOrigin @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/heaters") public class HeaterController extends Object
RESTful API for managing heaters in rooms

  • Method Details

    • findAll

      @GetMapping public List<HeaterDto> findAll()
      Retrieves a list of all heaters.
      Returns:
      list of heaters as DTOs

    • findById

      @GetMapping(path="/{id}") public HeaterDto findById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a specific heater by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the heater to retrieve
      Returns:
      heater as a DTO, or null if not found

    • switchStatus

      @PutMapping(path="/{id}/switch") public HeaterDto switchStatus(@PathVariable Long id)
      Toggles the status of a heater.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the heater to toggle
      Returns:
      updated heater as a DTO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if heater with given ID does not exist

    • create

      @PostMapping public HeaterDto create(@RequestBody HeaterDto dto)
      Creates a new heater in a room or updates an existing heater's status and power.
      Parameters:
      dto - DTO containing heater information, including ID, name, room ID, status, and power
      Returns:
      created or updated heater as a DTO

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}") public void delete(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a heater by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the heater to delete
